san-lo-mvu107:7: asmābhir api bhagavan kathaṁ piṇḍāya caritavyaṁ bhavati bhikṣāṁ dehīti || bhagavān āha || na hoti tūṣṇībhūtena uddeśena sthātavyaṁ | evam āryāṇāṁ yācanaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu107:8: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo atītamadhvāne ihaiva vārāṇasyāṁ nagare rājaputrasya asthiseno nāma purohitaputro vayasyo | so kāmeṣu ādīnavaṁ dṛṣṭvā parivrājakapravrajyāṁ pravrajito  kaumārabrahmacārī daśakuśalapathasamādāyavartī devapārago parivrājakaśāstreṣu gatiṁgato || so dāni rājaputro rājyaprāpto so naṁ asthisenaṁ purohitaputraṁ gāthāye adhyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:11: brahmacāri priyo me si yāce brahme yad icchasi ||
san-lo-mvu107:13: atha khalu bhikṣavo asthiseno vanīpako gāthāye pratyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:15: yācento apriyo bhavati adento bhavati apriyo |
san-lo-mvu107:16: tasmād bhavantaṁ na yācāmi mā me vidveṣaṇā bhavet* ||
san-lo-mvu107:18: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa kāśirājā asthisenaṁ vanīpakaṁ gāthāye pratyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:20: yo hi yācanako santo yācitavyaṁ na yācati |
san-lo-mvu107:21: paraṁ ca puṇyaṁ tyājeti ātmanā ca vihanyati ||
san-lo-mvu107:23: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ asthiseno vanīpako taṁ kāśirājaṁ pratyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:26: tasmād bhavantaṁ na yācāmi mā me ārodanaṁ bhavet* ||
san-lo-mvu107:27: na vai yācati saprajño nāryo veditum arhati |
san-lo-mvu107:28: uddeśa āryā tiṣṭhanti eṣā āryāṇa yācanā ||
san-lo-mvu107:30: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa kāśirājā asthisenaṁ vanīpakaṁ gāthāye pratyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:34: āryo hi āryasya kathaṁ na dadyā
san-lo-mvu107:37: bhagavān āha || nānyo bhikṣavas tadā sa kāśirājño asthiseno nāma purohitaputro parivrājako vayasyo abhūṣi | ahaṁ sa tadā asthiseno parivrājako abhūṣi ||
san-lo-mvu107:41: na vai yācati saprajño nāryo vedayitum arhati |
san-lo-mvu107:42: uddeśe āryās tiṣṭhante eṣā āryāṇa yācanā ||
san-lo-mvu107:44: evaṁ bhikṣavaḥ piṇḍacāraṁ caritavyaṁ || te dāni bhikṣū bhagavantam āhansuḥ || kim asmābhir bhagavaṁ bhikṣāye labdhāye vaktavyaṁ svasti svastīti || bhagavān āha || na bhikṣavo yuṣmābhir ādiśitavyaṁ bhikṣāyāṁ labdhāyāṁ ||
san-lo-mvu107:49: te dāni bhikṣū ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve varṣoṣitā diśodiśaṁ cārikāṁ prakrāntā || ṛṣivadane devatā teṣāṁ bhikṣūṇāṁ sthānāni caṁkramāṇi niṣadyāni śayyāni śūnyāni nirabhiramyāṇi dṛṣṭvā ratiṁ avindantī yena bhagavāṁs tenopasaṁkramitvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāye pratyabhāṣe ||
san-lo-mvu107:63: bhagavāṁ prasthito | nāvikena bhagavantaṁ dṛṣṭvā gaṁgātīram upasaṁkramantaṁ nāvā allīpitā || bhagavāṁ nāvam āruhya nāvikam āha ||
san-lo-mvu107:65: siṁca bhikṣu imāṁ nāvāṁ maitrāye siktā te laghu bheṣyati |
san-lo-mvu107:66: chittvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi ||
san-lo-mvu107:67: siṁca bhikṣu imāṁ nāvāṁ karuṇāya siktā te laghu bheṣyati |
san-lo-mvu107:68: chittvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi ||
san-lo-mvu107:69: siṁca bhikṣu imāṁ nāvāṁ muditāya siktā te laghu bheṣyati |
san-lo-mvu107:70: chittvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi ||
san-lo-mvu107:71: siṁca bhikṣu imāṁ nāvāṁ upekṣāye siktā te laghu bheṣyati |
san-lo-mvu107:72: chittvā rāgaṁ ca doṣaṁ ca tato nirvāṇam eṣyasi ||
san-lo-mvu107:74: adhigacchati padaṁ śāntaṁ asecanaṁ ca mocanaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu107:80: adhigacchati padaṁ śāntaṁ nirvāṇaṁ padam acyutaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu107:82: dharmaṁ samanusmaraṁ bhikṣu saddharmān na parihāyati ||
san-lo-mvu107:89: bhikṣu na tāvatā bhavati yāvatā bhikṣate parāṁ |
san-lo-mvu107:90: viṣamāṁ dharmāṁ samādāya bhikṣu bhoti na tāvatā ||
san-lo-mvu107:91: yo ca kāmāṁ ca pāpāṁ cādhikṛtvā brahmacaryavāṁ |
san-lo-mvu107:92: niḥśreṇībhūto saprajño sa vai bhikṣūti vuccati ||
san-lo-mvu107:93: yato care yato tiṣṭhe yato āse yato śaye |
san-lo-mvu107:94: yato saṁmiṁjaye kāyaṁ yato kāyaṁ prasāraye ||
san-lo-mvu107:99: cakṣuṣā saṁvaro sādhu sādhu śrotreṇa saṁvaraḥ |
san-lo-mvu107:100: ghrāṇena saṁvaro sādhu sādhu jihvāya saṁvaro ||
san-lo-mvu107:101: kāyena saṁvaro sādhu manasā sādhu saṁvaraḥ |
san-lo-mvu107:104: so dāni bhagavatā vaśībhāvena vinīto | siṁca bhikṣu imāṁ nāvāṁ ti ābhāṣṭasya yat kiṁcid gṛhiliṁgaṁ gṛhiguptaṁ gṛhidhvajaṁ gṛhikalpaṁ sarvaṁ samantarhitaṁ tricīvaraṁ cāsya prādurbhavet suṁbhakaṁ ca pātraṁ prakṛtisvabhāvasaṁsthitā ca keśā īryāpathaṁ cāsya saṁsthihe tadyathāpi nāma varṣaśatopasaṁpannasya bhikṣusya || evaṁ āyuṣmato gaṁgeyakasya nāvikasya pravrajyā upasaṁpadā bhikṣubhāvo ||
san-lo-mvu107:105: taṁ tahiṁ bhagavāṁ visarjayati || so dāni bhagavantaṁ āha || yadi bhagavaṁ kenacit pṛcchiyeyaṁ ko tvaṁ ti kiṁ mayā bhagavaṁ vaktavyaṁ || bhagavān āha || śramaṇo pi tvaṁ brāhmaṇo pi tvaṁ vedako pi tvaṁ tārako pi tvaṁ pārago pi tvaṁ ||
san-lo-mvu107:106: śakro devānām indro māṇavakavarṇam ātmānaṁ ṛddhīye abhinirmiṇitvā prāsādiko darśanīyo śobhanehi jaṭehi nīlehi nīlamayūragrīvasaṁnikāśehi sauvarṇena yaṣṭikamaṇḍalunā bhagavato pātracīvarakuṇḍikam ādāya pṛṣṭhato gacchati || jano āha || ko svāyaṁ māṇavako prāsādiko darśanīyo || so dāni āha ||
san-lo-mvu107:113: bhagavāṁ pi śakraṁ devānām indraṁ visarjayati ||
